author: Balbublock
title: Allow the vote for network updates
description: Updates are essential. It is going to be important to think about an updating process with community votes and discussions

title: Cardano Emerging Threat Alarm
description: How can we help stakeholders identify serious emerging systemic threats for the Cardano blockchain before a threat overcomes the system?

title: Cardano Web Hub
description: How can Cardano establish a more meaningful and impactful presence on the internet to reach out general public and community members ?

title: Celebrities Onboarding
description: How can we make Celebs (TV, music, film) embrace Cardano as platform for a token offering this year?

title: Clean Water
description: How can we encourage ADA owners to donate to clean water projects around the world.

author: Leonardo koshoni
title: Credit unions and co-operatives
description: How can credit unions extend the higher savings returns from DEFI to less sophisticated and tech savvy investors in developing countries?

author: Kriss
title: DLT Entrepreneurship Toolbox
description: How can early stage entrepreneurs develop their skills to execute & communicate great ideas so voters/stakeholders value the project

author: WADA(West Africa Decentralized Alliance)
title: DeFi and Microlending for Africa
description: How can we enable the creation of micro-lending and Defi dApp solutions that fits the African setting?

author: newmindflow
title: Decentralised Storage Solutions
description: How can we create a robust, reliable, secure and affordable decentralised, high-capacity storage network built upon the Cardano blockchain?

author: Moyk
title: Developer Courses
description: To adopt a training/apprenticeship program for those of us who are looking for a new career

description: How can we provide a system that allows non-tech entrepreneurs to create PPPs or orther forms of large-scale projects that will use Cardano?

title: Functional Paradigm Onboarding
description: How to demonstrate Functional Programing Capabilities within your own existing management system structure?

title: Global Impact: Fighting COVID
description: How can solutions built on Cardano help to deal with the COVID crisis?

author: ewmsteinebach
title: Lobbying team
description: In terms of spreading Cardano not all people are created equal. How can we reach the people that reach masses?

author: Roy Dopson
title: Marketing
description:
How do we tell as many people as possible about the New World Operating System during the

2021 bull market phase (ending Q4)?

author: Greg Bell
title: Migrate Ethereum
description: How can we get more Ethereum projects to start moving to Cardano in the next 3 months?

author: Dave Crossland
title: More wood behind fewer arrows
description: How can we increase Catalyst proposal strength?

title: Multilingual resources
description: How can we motivate non english speakers to learn and grow Cardano ecosystem in the next 3-6 months?

author: Ronin
title: Nation Building Dapps
description: What core Dapp solutions can be provided for widespread governments adoption in the developing world?

description: How do we lower the barrier to entry to participating - show what can be built on Cardano without coding

author: williamofthesun
title: One Book a Month
description: Write books on a typewriter to represent a stake pool, and publish and distribute the book once the node is saturated.

author: Ronin
title: Partnerships for Global Adoption
description: How can Cardano enter in global partnerships with United Nations Development Programme and World Bank Group, to leverage mass adoption?

title: Propose, build & deliver in 6 weeks
description: How can we offer people an opportunity to contribute without having to commit to a large budget while still getting a fair voting chance?

author: ewmsteinebach
title: Pyramid Rewards system
description: I would like to propose the concept of a pyramid structure in which people are actively rewarded for bringing in new people.

description: How can we empower delegators through self governance to influence stake pool engagement and foster a vibrant and diverse pool community?

title: Staking Pool Workshops

title: Success Tracking
description: How can we build and maintain a better success tracking experience for funded proposals?

title: Web-of-Trust Digital Identity

author: Q U A S A R
title: ZooCardano-Stories of Value
description: Can we create an NFT for proposals? Catalyst is the greatest event crypto has seen. How do we harness these "Stories of Value'? See icon.
